Jacob Daniel Wiese (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 1981) bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa, na nwa onye bụbu onye ijeri Christo Wiese
A mụrụ Jacob Wiese na Jenụwarị 1981, ọ bụ ọkpara n'ime ụmụ atọ nke Christo Wiese na nwunye ya Caro.

O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Value & Policy Studies na Mahadum Stellenbosch, nzere masta na International Economics & Management na Mahadum Bocconi, Italy na 2004, na nzere bachelọ na Iwu na Mahadum Cape Town na 2008.
Wiese bụ onye ọzọ na / ma ọ bụ onye na-abụghị onye isi nke New Look, Shoprite Holdings, Pepkor Holdings, Invicta Holdings, Tradehold, Premier Foods na Fairvest Property Holdings Ltd.
A na-ahụta ya dị ka onye nwere ike ịbụ onye nketa nke azụmahịa nna ya.
N'afọ 2011, ọ lụrụ Jackie Hawtrey, onye ọka iwu nke na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-azụ ụlọ ọrụ ejiji, na nwa ikpeazụ nke Melville na Dawn Hawtrey nke Cape Town. Ha bi na Bantry Bay, Cape Town.
